oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Study on the introduction of organic tomato greenhouse in Massa plain, Agadir, South Morocco
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ayoub, Mohamed
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vegetables
Morocco
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Organic tomato is growing these last four years in Morocco. As the local market isn't promoting, a great effort has been done in order to get the international market and mainly an European one. The outside season production of tomato need the greenhouse. That's why a greenhouse production of organic tomato is an important point to deal with it. (JAMEA EL MOSTAFA, 23 july, 2003)
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Ayoub, Mohamed (2002) Study on the introduction of organic tomato greenhouse in Massa plain, Agadir, South Morocco. Thesis, Mediterranean agronomic institute of bari, Organic Agriculture. . [Unpublished]
